Topic.Title: IBM and layoffs.. and US corporations

Message.Msg: I repeat: original date of incorporation was 1911 as the Tabulating and Recording Company - now known as IBM. You can check it on the company's own history site. Original point also stands about "knowing a lot of old-timers who started the company."
